hero.title: Casablanca-Settat Regional Ju-Jitsu League
hero.subtitle: Excellence, Discipline and Martial Tradition
hero.description: Join the official Ju-Jitsu community of the Casablanca-Settat region under the auspices of the Royal Moroccan Federation of Judo and Related Arts.

achievements.title: Our Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Representing Morocco with pride on the international stage

national.title: National Champions
national.description: Multiple national championship titles across various weight categories and age groups.

international.title: International Recognition
international.description: Representing Morocco in African and international Ju-Jitsu competitions.

youth.title: Youth Development
youth.description: Building the next generation of Moroccan Ju-Jitsu athletes through dedicated training programs.

about.title: About Our League
about.subtitle: The Casablanca-Settat Ju-Jitsu League stands as a pillar of excellence in Moroccan martial arts, fostering discipline, respect, and competitive spirit across the region.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To promote and develop Ju-Jitsu in the Casablanca-Settat region through structured training, competitive opportunities, and fostering values of discipline, respect, and excellence. We strive to create pathways for athletes to reach their full potential at regional, national, and international levels.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading Ju-Jitsu league in Morocco, recognized for our commitment to excellence, youth development, and sporting achievements. We envision a future where our athletes represent Morocco with pride on the global stage while embodying the values and traditions of this noble martial art.

achievements.title: Our Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Years of dedication have led to remarkable success in national and international competitions

throneCup.title: Throne Cup Champions
throneCup.description: Multiple victories in Morocco's most prestigious Ju-Jitsu competition

nationalMedals.title: National Medals
nationalMedals.description: Over 50 medals won at national championships across all age categories

internationalTeam.title: International Team
internationalTeam.description: 15+ athletes selected for Moroccan national team competitions

regionalExcellence.title: Regional Excellence
regionalExcellence.description: Recognized as the premier Ju-Jitsu organization in Casablanca-Settat region

leadership.title: Leadership & Champions
leadership.subtitle: Meet the dedicated leaders and outstanding athletes who drive our success

president.name: Mohammed Alaoui
president.description: With over 20 years of experience in martial arts administration, Mohammed has led our league to unprecedented success and recognition.

technicalDirector.name: Fatima Zahra Benali
technicalDirector.description: Former national champion and certified international referee, Fatima oversees our technical standards and athlete development programs.

champion.name: Youssef Tazi
champion.description: Three-time national champion and Throne Cup winner, Youssef represents the pinnacle of achievement in Moroccan Ju-Jitsu.

history.title: Our Journey
history.subtitle: A timeline of milestones that shaped our league into what it is today

2014.title: League Foundation
2014.description: Established as the official regional league under the Royal Moroccan Ju-Jitsu Federation

2017.title: First Throne Cup Victory
2017.description: Our athletes claimed their first major national championship title

2020.title: International Recognition
2020.description: First athletes selected for international competitions representing Morocco

2025.title: Digital Transformation
2025.description: Launch of our comprehensive digital platform for modern league management

callToAction.title: Join Our Legacy
callToAction.subtitle: Become part of Morocco's premier Ju-Jitsu community and reach your full potential

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We are here to answer your questions and support you in your Ju-Jitsu journey

info.title: Contact Information
info.description: Feel free to contact us for any questions about our activities, our affiliated clubs or to join our community.
